TEXT.TITLE: GREAT LAKES CHEMICAL <GLK> TO BUILD NEW PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Great Lakes Chemical Corp said it will build a new plant in El Dorado, Ark., to produce several fluorine-based specialty chemicals. It said total cost of the project, which would employ up to 50 workers, is estimated in excess of 20 mln dlrs. Reuter
